page.title: 17A TRESWELL FAMILY
page.content: HELLO! Our names are Frances and Norman Shaw.We go to Rampton Primary School.In our family there is Mum, Dad, six brothers and three sisters.Our house is in Treswell, at 5 Orchard Rise. This is a terrace of quite modern houses and ours has five bedrooms. There are about 80 houses in this lovely village but the roads are quite busy as it is a route to the power stations and Rampton Hospital. In our house we have a computer, video, sewing machine, two remote control television sets, two automatic washing machines, a tumble drier and a micro-wave oven. In our garden we keep fifteen hens, a cockerel and a dog. We are getting a cat very soon.
